title.rendered: Digital Business Marketing Apprenticeship 2025 at Google [18-24 Weeks; Google Workspace; Multiple Locations]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the Digital Business Marketing Apprenticeship 2025 at Google. Check the eligibility and apply before the link expires!

About Google

Google LLC is an American multinational corporation and technology company focusing on online advertising, search engine technology, cloud computing, computer software, quantum computing, e-commerce, consumer electronics, and artificial intelligence.

Job Details

The Google Digital Business Marketing Apprenticeship is a 24-month program that offers learning and development to individuals looking to start a career in Digital Business Marketing.

This apprenticeship is intended for applicants who have completed their university degree and are looking to kick-start their careers in Digital Business Marketing. If you’ve worked in the field for over 12 months, we encourage you to browse our careers website for other opportunities.

While at Google, you can work alongside a team of Googlers to solve real-life problems while developing and learning from exceptional leaders. An external training partner will also support you during the program.

As an Apprentice, you will help define, design, and implement campaigns across various Google ad platforms. Supporting Google client accounts and enhancing their advertising campaigns across platforms and apps. You will understand their needs and identify insights to make their digital marketing more effective across different Google products. You will do this in collaboration with cross-functional teams.

Digital Business Marketing apprentices tend to explore careers such as Ad Product Specialist, Account Manager, Business Development Associate, Digital Marketing Specialist, Search Engine Optimization Analyst, and Digital Marketing Manager.

Google aspires to be an organization that reflects our tools’ globally diverse audience. In addition to hiring the best talent, diverse perspectives, ideas, and cultures lead to better products and services. Interacting with people in all company parts will give you insight into our unique enterprise and corporate culture.

What will you learn to do?

  • Marketing on Digital Platforms and Apps (Creating value through digital ads)
  • Customers on Digital Platforms and Apps (Analyzing data to identify and target users)
  • Business Development and Decoding the Sales Funnel (Understanding the life of a lead)
  • Optimizing Digital Ad Accounts (Deep understanding of ad products)
  • Strategising and Evaluating Digital Campaigns (End to end campaign management)
  • Running a Digital Marketing Agency (Running a viable business with digital marketing expertise)
  • Troubleshooting Ad Technologies (Partnering with cross-functions to troubleshoot for ad customers)
  • Generative AI in Digital Marketing and at Work
  • Ad Product Certifications (Qualified understanding of leading ad products)

Responsibilities

  • Develop your knowledge of digital ad platforms, online campaigns and troubleshooting for ad accounts. Partner with teams to drive product and partnership solutions.
  • Learn business development by addressing leads from new and existing clients and act as an account coordinator and facilitator.
  • Learn to analyze data and derive insights to identify opportunities for clients and agencies.
  • Develop knowledge of existing and emerging advertising products and how users and clients may interact with them.
  • Develop knowledge on applying AI-based solutions for digital advertising and enhance productivity.

Minimum Qualifications

1. Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
2. One year of experience in a Digital Marketing role.
3. Experience using Google Workspace (e.g., Gmail, Chrome, Docs, Sheets, etc.) or similar applications.
4. Ability to communicate in English fluently, understand and execute instructions and learn via training documentation and presentations.

Preferred

  • Experience in any industry (e.g., Events, Media, Customer Service, Hospitality, Tourism, Accounting, etc.).
  • Ability to work with ambiguous tasks, find suitable solutions, and seek help or advice where appropriate
  • Ability to work independently and within a team framework.
  • Interest in building a career in Digital Marketing.
  • Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills.

Important Details

Selected applicants will be matched to a team and will need to relocate. Teams could be in Hyderabad, Gurugram, Mumbai, or Bengaluru. Relocation assistance is provided for those who move more than 100 km to their matched office location.

Apprenticeships are not full-time permanent opportunities; the program is 24 months long. While the program is open to those interested in Digital Marketing careers, recent graduates and individuals with work experience in other industries may apply.

This role is not eligible for immigration sponsorship.

The whole process will spread across 18 to 24 weeks; kindly be patient.

Note: By applying to this position, you will have an opportunity to share your preferred working location from the following: Hyderabad, Telangana, India; Gurugram, Haryana, India; Mumbai, Maharashtra, India; Bengaluru, Karnataka, India.

How to Apply?

Interested candidates can directly apply through this link.

Location

Hyderabad, Gurugram, Mumbai and Bengaluru.
